title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j) supporting sync/async calls and streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama-powered code completion and chat into the editor.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into Discord channels.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama providing Generator and Embedding components for Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-platform Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library (Hex package: ollama) for integrating Ollama models into Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client crate (ollama) providing strongly typed, async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift Package Manager library for macOS/iOS apps to communicate with a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community utilities: model converters, benchmark scripts, and sidecar proxies.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Crowd-sourced registry of custom Ollama model files with CI validation and download stats.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that adds /ollama slash commands to query local models with per-channel customization.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Ready-to-run RAG chatbot template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB with Streamlit UI.
